sqlMap.statement: SELECT SCHEDID AS "SCHEDID" , CRONEXP AS "CRONEXP" , JOBCLASSNAME AS "JOBCLASSNAME" , SCHEDDSTCD AS "SCHEDDSTCD" , SCANDIRNAME AS "SCANDIRNAME" , TIMERMSG AS "TIMERMSG" FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIES10 WHERE SCHEDID = #schedId#
UPDATE $schemaId$.TSEAIES10 SET CRONEXP = #cronExp# , JOBCLASSNAME = #jobClassName# , SCHEDDSTCD = #schedDstCd# , SCANDIRNAME = #scanDirName# , TIMERMSG = #timerMsg# WHERE SCHEDID = #schedId#
INSERT INTO $schemaId$.TSEAIES10( SCHEDID, CRONEXP, JOBCLASSNAME, SCHEDDSTCD, SCANDIRNAME, TIMERMSG) VALUES( #schedId#, #cronExp#, #jobClassName#, #schedDstCd#, #scanDirName#, #timerMsg#)
